snippet: Before his concert of Schubert, Beethoven and Lizst at the International Keyboard Institute and Festival, the pianist Cyprien Katsaris made a stern request to avoid piracy.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performance by pianist Cyprien Katsaris as part of the International Keyboard Institute and Festival at Mannes College the New School for Music.
lead_paragraph: Before his concert of Schubert, Beethoven and Lizst at the International Keyboard Institute and Festival, the pianist Cyprien Katsaris made a stern request to avoid piracy.

headline.seo: Cyprien Katsaris at the International Keyboard Festival
headline.main: Getting the Audience’s Attention, and Keeping It
headline.print_headline: Getting the Audience’s Attention, and Keeping It
